website_summaries.verdict: A quality masticating juicer with a double feed for faster, easier juice preparation.
pros: Easy to operate with three buttons and LED indicator
Has safety lock for added peace of mind
cons: Cleaning this machine can be a tedious job

customer_reviews.title: So far so GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I purchased a juicer from another brand and that was just a disaster- a whole bunch if foam in all the juice. So I returned that and got this one. I'm super happy with this juicer so far. Will update review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Better than imagined! Very easy to use, clean and so quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Corey&Angela Holsman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Just received and enjoyed it very much. It's definitely generating more juice than I excepted. Very easy to disassemble and clean. And it was fun to watch how it worked. Will get more fruits to try.
customer_reviews.author: Zeu

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The best juicer that I have used. Very easy to use and clean. Previous juicers were very difficult to clean so this machine is a dream. It is quiet in operation and quickly produces juice. The pulp was really dry. When choosing a new juicer, I did wonder if this one would be worth the extra cost - it is. I also love the design - sleek, black and minimalist. All the parts seem robust.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy operation
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, it only took me 5 minutes to set up anything because all I need to do was putting 3 pieces together and boom, it works just like that. Make sure you installed 3 pieces correctly because it will not turn on if you don't. The outcome is quite amazing, it gets the most juice out of fruits. The only downside is cleaning. It might take you some time to clean. Overall, it is a fully functional juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Dear MR.J

customer_reviews.title: it worth this price
customer_reviews.text: This machine is fantastic! It works well ,easy to clean and easy to use. Just put the fresh fruit inside, and you can get the pure natural juice ....i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: A great shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this juicer after I seen a lot of juicer online. I have used it for couple times and it never disappoint me. It's a excellent juicer serving its function. I can have fresh juice because of it. It helps me getting enough nutritions and vitamins that keep my body healthy.
customer_reviews.author: pwj

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this juicer for the past two weeks and I am very satisfied with the quality of the Aobosi juicer I find I don't have to cut items into small pieces. The stainless steel finish gives my kitchen a modern style and design. Easy assembly and clean, pretty quiet than my vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: Jiahuizi Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Great juice machine
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juice machine. The quality of the machine is great and the appearance is very beautiful. It can squeeze the juices of the fruit very dry. It also grind beans make soy milk . Very practical .
customer_reviews.author: Xi.h.j

customer_reviews.title: Overall worth recommending
customer_reviews.text: One recommended by others. The base is very stable. It won't wobble during the juice extraction process. The sound is acceptable and not very harsh. Squeezed carrot juice, the juice still contains flesh, not delicate enough.Very clean. Rinse with water. Assembly is also very simple. The operation is even easier. There is a disadvantage, there will be fruit residue in the juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like this slow juicer. I spent some time doing my research before I chose this slow juicer, and I am happy with my choice. This juicer is very worth the money, it works quite well. It is easy to use since the feeder chute is big so I don’t need to cut the veggies and fruits into very small pieces. It is quite and works faster than I thought. Another plus is it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This slow masticating juicer has a very good quality. It is simple to use. When the juicer start working, the juice will come out completely pure on the other side. Even though it should only makes fruits or vegetables juice, but I also use it to make soy drinks, just want to see if it can complete the task. When the results comes out, it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to clean. I use it to make apple and grape juice. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for families with babies. Easy to operate and clean. You can use fruits, vegetables and other foods you like. It’s much better than V8.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy my juice
customer_reviews.text: This machine works very well ! It squeezes almost last drop out of the fruit and veggies . Now I can make my own organic juice ! Much cheaper but super healthy!
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this Masticating Juicer. The juice is beyond amaizing and with no noise. My son is really a picky eater and hardly likes anything, but he loves the juice made from this machine. Beside this, they have a great customer service. When I first bought it, the product had a problem with the legs’ length and kept moving and shaking. I contacted the seller and they were very nice to accept the return and let me buy a new one almost free. I strongly recommend it to infant/toddler moms.
customer_reviews.author: Albana

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We are into the second month of using this juicer. It works well for the price we paid. Hopefully it will last longer than the juicer we purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: JW, Cupertino CA

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three days-not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this machine at all, poor engineering gets hot and the thermal sensor shuts the machine down ,making you wait until it cools down,does not make great juice by leaving a lot of pulp,making you have to strain it poor plastic moving parts that could break,it's not worth it,I am upgrading to the angel juicer the best in class with all stainless
customer_reviews.author: Good morning

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality juicer
customer_reviews.text: So So frustrating!!!!!! It can only extract little of juice because 50% of the juice remained in the pulp. I have to throw lots of wet pulp. What a waste! The juice comes out with a smells of bad toxic plastic fumes. It is unhealthy and poisonous. Terrible!!! The machine also difficult to clean, I got a lot of parts to clean otherwise it gets clogged. Extremely unhappy with this purchase, will be returning it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Yfc

customer_reviews.title: Hazard
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I plugged it in it started smoking before I even turned it on smelling of dangerous toxic plastic fumes
customer_reviews.author: Pike

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product. Very difficult to INSTALL. I ignored the negative reviews that people wrote on this juicer. Horribly designed and made from cheap plastic. You can only EXTRACT little of juice and it's got a lot of parts to clean or else it gets clogged. When I plugged it ready to use it, it was making terrible noise. I stopped and reseated all the parts, and the same noise came up again. The interface of plastic is broken. Scratch visible everywhere on the plastic. Never ever buy this product. It is a waste of money and hands down the worse product I have ever purchased. DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Guess what

customer_reviews.title: HAZARDOUS PRODUCT - Burst while operating
customer_reviews.text: Thinking about this product makes me shutter. I used this product less than 10 times when it burst one day while operating it. Hard, thick shards of plastic went everywhere and by the grace of God I did not lose an eye. I certainly would have and/or required stitches if these parts hit my face. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE. I was shaking and literally threw the entire product away immediately. There was not contact at the company; no real accountability or option to return at that point. I would never purchase this brand again. Separately, my $50 Waring juicer I've had for almost 20 years (purchased on Overstock) still works like a charm. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Piece broke, no customer service available.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this juicer and used it daily for almost four months. Then a plastic piece broke while in use. The company will not return my emails asking for a replacement part. I have contacted them twice , even using their service forms complete with the serial number. I am very upset. Now we have to buy a new juicer. This time I will be going with a more reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pulp gets stuck in chute
customer_reviews.text: This juicer worked great for the first 3-4 uses. Now every time I juice, the pulp gets stuck around the spinner, and inside the chute, and none of it gets pushed out into the pulp container. This causes clean up to be a nightmare because all of the prices are being held together with strings of the pulp, so it’s very difficult to pull the pieces apart. Once the pieces are apart it’s not an easy rinse off since the pulp is stuck in the chute, I have to jab a stick in there and try and pull it out. Clean up lates about 15-20 mins. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Tech support was not helpful and really complicated the job of returning the product.
customer_reviews.text: The on/off button didn’t respond and the whole thing is cumbersome and not easy to assemble, take apart or clean contrary to what I have read. Tech support at Amazon was not helpful at all and could never understand my issues. Instead of sending me a replacement for one of the pieces which was fefective, he sent me a second juicer, which made it an incredible challenge to repack both juicers and return them. This was not a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This juice machine is really recommended. It has a large caliber, hand-held fruits and vegetables. It doesn’t need to be cut, it’s very convenient, the sound is very small, and it doesn’t feel noisy at all. The machine slag juice is fast. I tried a lot of fruits. The original taste, super fresh and pure, the pomace is pressed dry, it is very easy to clean after use, and it will be used again after arrival. Now every day, healthy vegetables and fruits are smashed. Very good.👍
customer_reviews.author: Meriiam Kati

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: One of our favorite kitchen items to date! Bought this (never owned a juicer before) and truly fell in love with this piece of machinery!! The instructions to set it up were pretty easy to follow and my wife and I got this thing up and running within about 10 minutes. It juices like a pro and we found it easy to use. Cleaning is relatively easy with the brush that it comes with. I learned that cleaning it right after using is the best way to get all the little fibers out of the small perforations. Would definitely recommend for anyone in the price range. I attached a video to get a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Li

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty enough for avid daily users of juicer
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so well for about 3 months, we followed all directions and cared for it gently. We juice daily, carrots, beets, cucumber, celery, cilantro, zucchini and some other things. We had to be careful to mix the most fibrous of these and cut in tiny pieces and juice interspersed with the more watery veggies. It worked great until tonight when the top portion cracked during juicing for no apparent reason. Very odd and I'm sad it broke after the warranty was expired. Overall it's a decent juicer for light use id say. Loved the wide chute! OK value for the money, but if you really want to juice every day you need something more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: lauren jaimes

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It can make a variety of fruit juice vegetable juice. I really like to drink orange juice. Before I bought this juicer, I usually buy orange juice from the supermarket, but none of them are fresh orange juice. Now I have It can drink fresh orange juice every day, and it is very convenient to disassemble and clean. It is a very worthwhile product.
customer_reviews.author: babay

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and great for whole fruits
customer_reviews.text: I looked for awhile for a good juicer. I chose this one because of the wide top shoot. This means I can put an entire peice of fruit like an apples and orange right behind eachothet and it would grind them down to juice. Less chopping and preparing the fruit. Whatever you do don't lose the directions. This is not easy to assemble the first time and its hard to clean so watch the videos and read directions carefully. Once you get the hang of it its easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fikes

customer_reviews.title: a nice upgrade juicer to get more vitamins juice for the family.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased to get this before the holidays for its functions meet what I need for the whole family. First, it has no sharp blades or something like that, which makes it so easily and safely clean and operating even for kids to make their own juice. Second, the top feeder offers a big 83mm opener and a small 38mm mouth to compatible both trunk pieces of vegetables and small ingredients. Third, it is a real juicer maker with the main function work so well there are 3 press buttons and low-speed motor, the auger spins smoothly to make out high-quality juice in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ted M.

customer_reviews.title: A must if you're a juicer
customer_reviews.text: Super easy tp put together. Instruction are rasy to follow and theres also a step by atep picture chart on how to install it which was really helpful. I love that all i have to do is wash my fruits and veggies, no peeling and jist throw it in the juice. It cuts my juicing time in half. Cleaning is also super easy you just take the part in half soak then in water you can let it sit for a little bit and wash it off. I love that it come with a little brush too
customer_reviews.author: Asmany

customer_reviews.title: Nice and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, powerful juicer. I love fresh juice, but peeling and cutting fruit to small pieces can be a pain. However, with this slow juicer all I do is peel and drop the whole orange or apple into the mouth at the top one after the other, and let the juicer finish the job. I especially like the wide chute which makes it easy to clean. It even includes a thoughtfully designed cleaning brush that helps a lot to quickly and easily remove the pulp when cleaning out the machine. The control pad is sleek and professional, and my family has said it really feels like a luxury item.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I throw it away if not be returned
customer_reviews.text: I have had this juicer for about some days now. why did I give it a 1 star? I don't like the feeder shoot. It is very difficult to feed lettuce, kale, spinach anything leafy. It is loud an squeaky. the discharge clogs up when I juice things like celery or ginger that is stringy. Now having said that - it does make good juice, it leaves a lot of pulps in the juice. Im not sure if this item had been returned, but I couldnt disassemble the juicer enough to give it an initial cleaning. i ended up returning it and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Get more nutrients. Worth its cost.
customer_reviews.text: Is the first time that I use a masticating juicer. Before of this juicer I was used the centrifugal juicer and the nutribullet, but never I paid attention to the benefits to use a masticating juicer. The masticating juicer give us a juice that retains more nutrients because fruits and vegetables aren’t shredded with blades. The color en the juices are bright and with less foam after make the juices. Easy to get juice from green leaves. Who knows the Gerson Therapy, they recommend a masticating juicer to get the benefits from recommend vegetables in their therapy so I recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Melyce

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This juicer has an extra wide feed slot, that doesn't require too many cutting procedures and is very quick to juice. Includes a detachable hopper to make smaller ingredients more convenient. Equipped with a detachable blade for easier cleaning, it is ideal for pressing vegetables and fruits. I made my first juice a few days ago and it tastes great. It is really a life change for me and my diet. I like to try different fruits and vegetables every time and it tastes great. It works very fast and the machine itself is powerful and effective. Very easy to use. If you are looking for a great juicer, it is highly recommended to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it is really strong that it extracts most juice out of fruit. I used it for water melon, orange, peach and several other fruit so far. Juice doesn't have punch or foam. I noticed it is fast, can squeezed 3 orange in 1 minute. Quiet too. All goes really well. It's easy to assemble and disassemble, not a hassle to clean it at all. So far I use it quite a lot. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: WEI Z

customer_reviews.title: Great work!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several slow juicers, champions and Panasonic before, and now I still have two working ones in my hand. I bought this because it has a wider mouth. I hope it can process fruits and vegetables faster. I received it today in about a week and just tested it a few minutes ago. This is the output: of the 4 ounces of cabbage leaves, I got 2.3 ounces of juice. A pound of peeled carrots is actually 17 ounces. I have 8.2 ounces of juice. From a 3.8 ounce apple, I got 3 ounces of juice. It is really faster than any juicer I have used before. I think this is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Good slow juicer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to by a juicer for a while but could not decide on which one to buy. My friend recommend a well known band, but it was too expensive. When I found this one, I thought I would give it a try because the price is reasonable. I am glad I did. It looks pretty, very good value for the price. More importantly, the pulp come out really dry so i am wasting any fruit, unlike the one I got before.
customer_reviews.author: Thien T Ma

customer_reviews.title: Get This Not That
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. I searched high and low making sure I picked the one that beat mimic the higher brand I wanted. It’s definitely easy to clean and squeezes the most juice. I made some apple juice and it’s important that the discarded pieces are dry symbolizing very little juice if any was left over. I love the color and it’s definitely a talking point when people enter my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz McFlee

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer extractor! It is very easy to assemble and clean. Super easy to use as well. You can extract juice from oranges without peeling them, but they taste bitter like the shell. I've used apples, carrots, celery, and oranges so far. My kids will drink the juice, too! I highly recommend it. I read the reviews before I purchased it, and I agree with the positive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ipuna E. Black

customer_reviews.title: Is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: OK this is my first juicer in years and the first time I’ve been introduced to the masticating juicer. It is superior to the old high-speed you sir. I was a little nervous about buying this device because I’ve never heard of the brand. But it is solid it is fun to use and my first two juicing experiences and by the way I was able to set it up and be juicing 10 minutes after opening up the box.... Is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: steven cull

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional and convenient juicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought such a good juicer for the first time. I have also bought other brands before. It broke after a few times and this one has been used for a while. It is very easy to use and convenient. The elderly and children in our family I like to drink freshly squeezed juice. I have never bought juice in the supermarket. Now I drink juice almost every day. It is very convenient and I especially like good products and recommend
customer_reviews.author: JIN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean with brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have owned a juicer like this,is better than last one.easy to clean with brush.take less than 5 min.easy to operate.i can put a whole orange in and it will crush it automatically ,saving a lot of time.i no longer have yo go grocery store to buy expensive juice,also I can make veggie juice at home.i tried a papaya,and come out quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine about a week ago, after using it several times, I decided to write a review about it because really I’m so happy I Bought it First of all it is easy to use This means it is convenient to use and wash it after use it . Second, it doesn't produce loud noises and this definitely is a plus for the users. Even for this price I cannot believe how it’s great 👍 I heard my friend she bought more expensive Juicer machines but was not good like this one ,, I would recommend for every kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Samar khalil

customer_reviews.title: Get the seed out of the oranges.  The juice will be bitter.
customer_reviews.text: I used this juicer to juice oranges, that is my main goal. The only thing this juicer do not have, it will not separate the seed from the orange. I have another juicer that will separate the seed, but I like both of them. This one I can juice apples. I have to peel the apple because I do not want to eat the wax on the apple. Other than that its a great juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This juicer machine is incredible and amazing. The product is well designed. It's pretty quiet during use. My old juice machine was loud and hard to clean. I stop use it for two weeks because of too much preparing work associated with. Unlike my old one, this machine is awesome! I don’t need to cut the stuff to smaller piece before I drop them in. I love the stainless steel looking. A lot better than the plastic ones I saw in Macys! I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend to any juice lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Zack D

customer_reviews.title: Clear and pure juice
customer_reviews.text: I bought more than one fruit juice squeezer and used it, and then I returned it because I did not like the juice because the juice is not pure, and when I bought this fruit juicer and used it, I found it better than the previous one, as it is easy to use and clean, and most importantly of all, the juice is pure and clear
customer_reviews.author: Aisel

customer_reviews.title: best one
customer_reviews.text: Very good slow juicer. This machine doesn't need to cut small pieces, the whole fruit is put in to save a lot of time. The juice rate is very high, the slag is very dry. The installation is relatively simple. The most important thing is that it is easy to clean the machine, it will not There are a lot of places that can't be washed. The noise is acceptable when the machine is working.
customer_reviews.author: jun

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to find a good juicer. I have a juicer at home, but it cannot be separated from the pulp and juice, so I bought this. It is the same as the product description. It solves the habit of my children who don’t like water. , I will make some juice for my child every day, it's really good.. and very safe..
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We used to own a Breville juicer and overall, the assembly was pretty similar and I like that this juicer came with two jugs for the waste and juice. My only complaint would be the top compartment for whole fruits- it couldn’t really fit a whole fruit as advertised so we still had to cut it. It also didn’t juice greens that well compared to the Breville so we had to use our vitamix to blend the greens after juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Akram Chahin

customer_reviews.title: Probably my worst purchase on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Although I enjoy the juice that comes out of this, this thing is a beast to clean. And even worse to disassemble. Celery gets lodged underneath it and it’s impossible to disassemble to clean. Sometimes it takes 20 minutes just to disassemble it. Couple days after writing this review the machine completely broke. It hasn’t even been 40 days since purchasing. I had to downgrade my review. Shameful! Really No stars.
customer_reviews.author: lilbirdface

customer_reviews.title: Very Efficient Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, I was able to clean and setup this juicer in under 5 minutes. I have used other juicers in the past and they were all loud. I found this one was fairly quiet compared to others. . It does a great job of getting as much juice as possible and was very easy to clean up afterwards. Out of the few juicers I have owned this one is a must purchase, especially for the cost compared to some of the big name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Pain to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Chinese torture device. Don't get me wrong it does make juice pretty well but the feed opening is very small and it is he'll to clean. Purchased a juicer years ago from a TV ad and thought it was a pain to clean, this is x4 worse by a long shot. Not really sure how it received the reviews it did on Amazon but if I had to do it over I would have gone with a different juicer.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: So glad we got this one
customer_reviews.text: It has 47-60 RPM motor and really extracts a lot of the juice ,most of the left over pulp is dry. The clean up is a cinch. Easy to take apart clean and put together. Total time for juicing and clean up for 16 oz is under 10 minuets. The chute is large enough to consume medium size apple whole, which make life easier for user that prefer not to take time to cut their fruits/ veggies into smaller pieces. It’s powerful and much quieter than I expected. I love it and use it daily. Hope it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer
customer_reviews.text: My family loves fruit juice that why we buy this juicer. It impresses me by the picture that can put the whole orange with skin in. I didn’t try with the whole orange, I want to keep my juicer work longer so I cut the fruit to small size. This juicer comes with very clear instruction help you install quickly and easy to operate, juice come out 1 side and pulp come out another side. The juice really purity, my kids really love it. High end design, durable material that meet all our expecting. Recommend this juicer
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer, good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Juicer is very easy to use. In the past, the simple version was used. The juice produced a lot of residue and then it was filtered through a sieve. Now I use this juice machine to separate the pulp in one step, which is really easy to use! The only drawback is that you do n’t want to clean it. Haha...
customer_reviews.author: Qiudan lin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made. This is a very well constructed juicer, I would put it up there with the higher priced models. Instructions were clear and easy. It was easy to assemble. The juice that came out was the cleanest I have seen. Normally there's usually about an inch of foam at the top of the glass this was not the case with this juicer. It was also one of the quieter juicers I have ever used. And there have 3 press buttons and LED display is more easy to handle this juicer. I think the quality goes up there with the higher price juicers so I feel that the price was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Love this Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream come true!! I was so close to spending hundreds of dollars on a "Good Juicer" but luckily I went and ordered this one! I've been using it for 2 weeks straight twice a day and no issues so far... easy to assemble, clean, and the fruits and vegetables break up nicely! Ordered one for my brother in- law a week later!
customer_reviews.author: Chyna Chenault

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and the juice came out great
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this juicer. It can take a large amount of fruit at once and there's no clogging at all. So far we made orange juice and apple juice, it came out great and the taste is way better than all the fresh sqeeze jucie that we bought from the store. The machine is also very easy to take them apart and clean, we able to clean them under 2 minutes. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Chen

customer_reviews.title: Very strong working ability
customer_reviews.text: I bought aobosi Juicer two years ago. It's been used until now. It works very well and the juice is very clear if you have children at home. I recommend you buy aobosi juicer. My baby is one year old. I put the juice from this Juicer in the bottle for him to drink. The nipple won't clog up. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Aferdo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite juicer. Fall in love with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a juicer specially used for squeezing vegetable juice and fruit juice. The machine is also very convenient to assemble, and during my use, I found that once the machine is incorrectly assembled, the machine will not turn on, so that we will find the problem and adjust in time. In short, it is safe, convenient and practical. It is a juicer that I strongly recommend to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Jingjing C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I received my aobosi an originally I was very excited for its arrival upon its arrival I became very disappointed. I opened the box which had a huge oil stain. Then I proceded to take the juicer out an right away I can see this product was used. The machine had scratches every where an some kind of powder on the inside. Not to mention a foul odor to top it off wasted money Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice slow masticating juicer extractor that I bought last month. This is a great quality juicer machine that is bigger than I though when I received the package. It is not hard to assemble the cold press juicer machine to use. This juicer machine has the big feed chute that I can save time to cut the fruits and vegetables into little pieces and put it in. It is fast and easy to making the fresh juice in the morning. The juicer machine is BPA-free materials and has excellent corrosion resistance and heat resistance. I will recommend this great quality slow masticating juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis wolf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and clean no blade security level high
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble just follow the instructions. It won’t operate until you assemble correct so the security level is high. It is very easy to clean and feel safe as not blade. There just three button on the machine so easy to use. 5 oranges make a two cup of orange juice. Worth the value!
customer_reviews.author: TenthEdition

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered really fast and I can’t live without it! I personally love having fresh celery juice every morning. This juicer makes it super easy to whip up fresh pressed juice in minutes and the pulp free juries tastes so smooth. If you are in a hurry in a morning, this is definitely gonna save you a bunch of time.
customer_reviews.author: Surgarless Evy

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is strong, sturdy, and runs surprisingly quiet. It has a really nice weight to it on the countertop and doesn't slide. Pulp came out pretty dry so the machine works really well! The juicer is packaged and designed well as all parts were easy to clean and remove. I think it's a very sleek machine and was fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: George Bush

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new juicer...worth every penny. At first I was very skeptical that I was going to be good...once I used it I was like wow! It is simple to put together and just as simple to dissemble and clean. With the cleaning tools provided, cleaning the parts is not a daunting task at all.
customer_reviews.author: Janice.L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I have had it about 2 weeks, and it has worked wonderfully. So far so good. Amazed how simple to put together and easy to use. This is by far the best juicer I owned, mainly because I actually use it as it does not take too much time to make juice. It also does not take too much space away. Everything is dishwasher safe so very easy to clean. You can also clean out by hand easily.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Z.

customer_reviews.title: it will let you love juice.
customer_reviews.text: this device let me fall in love with juice. it is high juice yield. it have dual speed juicer system. low range price. it is very sleek and stylish. it is a vertical design, so it need less space. currently i didn’t meet over heat issues. just have a little noisy, but thought hard to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: tiny

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer and I boy do I feel dumb for not buying it sooner. I am a juice junky now. Easy to use and clean. Not designed for leafy veggies but great for stuff with lots of liquid in it such as nectarines, peaches, apples etc.
customer_reviews.author: Troy F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to juice
customer_reviews.text: A very easy to use juice machine, with low squeezing juice, high juice yield, low vibration when the machine is in operation, good airtightness, no fruit residues everywhere, cleaning is also very convenient, just rinse it with clean water Too. At the end, they are all separated from the juice. very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 3 1/2 months ago, used maybe 10 times- won't work at all now, can't return.
customer_reviews.text: I'm super bummed. I bought this on the last day of May. I have used it maybe 10 times and only for celery juicing. I am very careful with how I use it and I diligently clean it after every use by hand. It now won't turn on at all. Apparently the return window is closed. I always buy the warranty so either there wasn't one noticeably available at purchase or at all, ,or this busy mama of five simply checked out without it but either way it totally sucks. If you buy this I would buy the warranty (if its available) or I would buy something else, because now I'm out a juicer AND my money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pruneda

customer_reviews.title: Won't juice carrots, cheap plastic breaks!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I started using this. It is easy clean and put together. I am upset that I've used it 5 times and it broke. I was juicing kale, spinach, apples, and it was working well but the moment I tried a carrot the side popped out. This is rediculous! Really?! I can't juice a carrot?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must have for a family! I used to spent money some juice shop until I bought it. It makes fruits juice smooth to drink and I can’t tell you how much my kids love it. Plus, this one definitely worthwhile for its value, I see people bought different ones but none of them works like what I have. So highly recommended! You won’t regret!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean. And save space
customer_reviews.text: I have a Vitamix, but that dosent work with fruits with thick fiber well. So I got this one to extract pure juice for those fruits. It is really easy to assemble and use. And unlike others that take a lot space, this product is designed vertically that save much more space. And it is quiet!!! Which is another best part over the traditional blender.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Not good for celery juice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first, however the more I used it the more trouble it became. I juice celery daily and need something to hold up to it, the celery pulp constantly backed up into the filter chamber which caused the juice to leak out, pulp would also end up in my juice. It was easy to use and clean. I have returned my upright model and am hoping the other model will be better!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: great design and works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: blows doors on my centrifugal machine. My juicing time was 1/2 the time and 2x as much juice. I've only used one time - so far so good. I'm so happy. Works better if you cut things up especially celery. Barely any pulp.
customer_reviews.author: angela anderson

customer_reviews.title: So much ‘Pulp’ left behind
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning the product. I purchased the juicer to replace my centrifuge juicer. I’m doing a juice cleanse and felt this would give me more nutrients. However, there is sooo much ‘pulp’ leftover in the juice that I have to do an additional strain to get it all out. Otherwise there’s small slivers of vegetables left in the juice.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Broke with in 3 month use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product mid August used it moderately and today while in use apiece of it broke off. The piece that screws on by sliding in top of each other just snapped off and broke. Unfortunately the warranty expired September 13th and now I have no juicer. I do not recommend this plastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Android Phone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If this juicer review had a 10🌟 I’d give it a 10, it’s by far the best investment I’ve made. I’m amazed how everything on the decreption is on point. Everything that I’ve read on the review are all accurate. It’s def worth buying this item. The price perfect. I’ve been looking for a juicer for a while and looked through amazon for a while going by the 5🌟reviews only then I narrowed it down to the less expensive ones and this is the one that came up. I can’t say enough how glad I am to buy it. Thank you AMAZON I’m one happy customer
customer_reviews.author: jin

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is amazing for making juices with minimal pulp. Many juicers out there have trouble separating the pulp from the juices, but not this one. It is also very affordable and also fairly quiet compared to other juicers. This allows me to get creative and make different combinations of juices. Also the kids love it a lot. It is very healthy and efficient!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat•N

customer_reviews.title: huang
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is very good, and I often squeezed the fruit from the day I bought it. And the price is very fair, mainly when it is squeezed, it will directly separate your fruit residue. He has two cups, which is very convenient. I feel that I bought this product. The two children like to drink juice. If you have children in your family, you can give it a try. With this juicer, the body is also pretty. I also like this design, so I recommend this beautiful and easy to use juice. Really Not bad 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: huangxy

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a great easy to clean easy to use juicer and I found this ! Even when I am running late it is such an easy clean up and easy to use, I always have enough time to juice.I recommend this machine even comparing to the $300 model I use on occasion. The size is also very nice for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Fraz Amjad

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juicer, because most of the time I only make one or two cups of juice. I like to make different kinds of juice everyday. This juicer is easy to set up and clean. Its compact design does not occupy much space and good for small kitchen. This juice is high efficient and produce more juice than some similar products. It costs a little more than my old juicer, but I think it worth the money, since it produce more juice with the same amount of fruits than my old machine.
customer_reviews.author: zhenju chen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Motor overheated after first use and made juice warm. Difficult to assemble and is not stuck. Asked for a refund but Amazon is charging a restocking fee. And it’s terrible to clean bc the juiced scraps are not contained and stuck in the mesh and juicer parts
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: This machine is good quality, easy to use and clean up
customer_reviews.text: This machine is good quality, easy to use and clean up. It does not take much time to make enough juice for family with 4 peoples. We have tried with different kind of fruits and vegetables to make really good juices with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: When this product worked, it was adequate. The downside is it does not juice celery. Even when chopped into bite sized pieces. Does not handle parsley at all. Product instantly clogged when attempting parsley even though it was chopped prior. Half way through 4 carrots and a celery stalk, had to take the machine apart and declog the fiber chute. Product is also very hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Good then bad
customer_reviews.text: Made great juice for a year. Unfortunately the plastic lip that holds the top in place broke rendering the juicer useless. Cannot in good conscience recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer fairly quiet and runs very smoothly, unlike my old Juicer. It also save my time because no need to chop the fruits, just throw whole fruit into juicer. I am very pleased with it's performance, i would recommend it to anyone who wants a quality juicer for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Returned after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The juicer was not effective. A lot of juice was getting wasted in the pulm. I asked the manufacturer what can be done and they only suggested to cut fruit smaller or juice a different vegetable. Anyway I kept it because this is one of the most affordable option with good reviews. But then I returned after 2 months as the product stopped working. (Amazon was kind enough to help me with the return) No response from supplier on warranty request.
customer_reviews.author: Pre

customer_reviews.title: Loooove this juicer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer. I was looking into buying the nama or breville juicer but decided on this affordable alternative. Only down side is that it cant do almond milk but I have a blendtec and I have been making almond milk in that. This juicer is extremely easy to assemble and clean, my kids love the healthy juices we have been making. So far i have juiced oranges, whole apples carrots and mangos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine, fast,
customer_reviews.text: The last thing i was expecting is the size of this machine it is very small and compact, but don’t get me wrong this thing is powerful and simple. We decided not to waste the fibers from the fruits and made smoothies out of it just to give you and idea!!
customer_reviews.author: David Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Easy recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall! Can take entire Orange/Apple and returns juices. However the juice does taste better if orange is peeled. Cleaning is not hard if clean it right after use. It doesn’t says dishwasher save but I tried and has no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Novikoff

customer_reviews.title: If you looking to lose money and potentially get injury - this is the right product.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to lose money- this is the right product. It broke after my first time of using it (and I followed all recommendations: cut veggies for small purses etc) Plastic is so weak that it popped with such speed that if not for fast reaction- I would end up with injury of my eye. Well to sum it up - Save your money and DO NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to operate, most importantly it’s very easy to clean! I use to own couple of other juicers for the last few years, by far this one definitely a better and quicker unite when comes to cleaning. Part that impressed me the most was that I get more amount of juice compared to previous models that I owned. Definitely give this unit a try!
customer_reviews.author: Ren zhang

customer_reviews.title: It is fine machine
customer_reviews.text: You can put a whole Orange or Apple into the machine without cutting, except the skin of ranges or lemon may not taste good. I squeeze juice from Ginger with skin on, that taste fine. Over all it's very convenient to have a machine like this.
customer_reviews.author: Trixximum

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a handmade juice for 2 years. This machine is really good at a job of squeezing. I would say 90% of the juice from the fruit be squeezed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lichang Tan

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Feel the design of this juicer. quality. Juice rate. Noise. Very good. Cost-effective. I use apples and oranges to make juice with different vegetables. Add a little ice. taste good. healthy! Just don't like to clean up .lol. This is a disadvantage of all juicers.
customer_reviews.author: Xin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even turn on
customer_reviews.text: I got everything out and ready to juice. I followed the instructions to put it together, it even made the little tick sound when I locked it. Doesn't work. I checked the outlet and it is fine. I took it apart and followed the instructions again to make sure it wasn't user error. This didn't even turn on. I'm having a replacement sent hoping it was just a fluke. We will see. Will update if the next one works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

product_meta.title: Aobosi Slow Masticating Juicer 83mm(3.15inch) Wide Chute Juice Extractor Cold Press Juicer Machine with Quiet Motor/Reverse Function/Juice Jug and Clean Brush for High Nutrient Fruit & Vegetable Juice
feature_bullets: ✔🍇🎀Best Gift!🎀 DOUBLE FEEDER CHUTES(83MM+38MM) : With extra wide 3.15 inch(83MM) BIG MOUTH can easily accommodate large ingredients (Apple, Orange, Pear, etc). Greatly reduces preparation and cleanup time. Less chopping of the ingredients also helps to reduce oxidation. Also equipped with 38MM small mouth which is suitable for the vegetables and small ingredients(Celery, Carrot, etc) . Please cut the celery into small pieces that can prevent getting stuck broken or hard to disassembly.

✔🍅HIGHEST NUTIRTIONAL VALUE WITH LOW SPEED MOTOR : Slow masticating can perfectly separate juice and pulp,extracting higher-purity juice and preserving higher nutritional value. Our auger spins at 47-60 RPM (the best slow speed in the market now: UP TO 90% JUICE YIELD) that can preserves the vitamins, enzymes, minerals, trace minerals and nutrients from being destroyed than centrifugal juicers. Please use the fresh or watery ingredients that can ensure the juice yield as for your expectation.

✔🍒CONVENIENT & QUIET OPERATION: With 3 press buttons and LED display indicator, it is very easy to operate, assemble and remove the juicing bowl in minutes. Plus the drip-free design, you can mix different juices and prevent juices spilling out. The motor runs quietly – less than 60 decibels. Heavy-duty and stable body that let you enjoying a quiet environment and healthy life when making juice. Please touch the electric part of the juicer with the dry hand to ensure the safety operation.

✔🍉SAFE & EASY TO CLEAN: This juicer uses the safety system, it will not operate unless the juicer cover is in place. So please see the assembly steps before your first time usage. All parts are made of high quality TRITAN food grade anti-oxidation materials(BPA-free). We suggest use the REVERSE FUNCTION after juicing to avoid stuck and helps you to disassemble and clean. All detachable parts are easy cleaning with a bonus brush or can be safely cleaned in your dishwasher.

✔🍏 PREMIUM SERVICE: For Amazon customers, this product comes with Lifelong Technical Support & 24 Hours PREMIUM SERVICE. If you have any issues about the juicer, please contact us first, we will give you the satisfied solution as soon as possible.
